MIME element (text/plain)
GCC: ICC Champions Trophy 2006 infringements- ICC_NRID14029 
 
NetResult Internal Reference:  ICC_NRID14029 
 
Please quote the above ICC_NRID14029 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue. 
 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited  which owns and/or controls the
worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Champions Trophy 2006. 
  
We have noticed that your website,
http://www.yourfreespace.net/users/pkrox2/cricket/ is displaying,
promoting and or offering A/V content from the ICC Champions Trophy
2006. All copyright in such images vest with ICC Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC
Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte
Limited to use this content, your present use is an infringement of the
ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation
Pte Limited rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of ICC Development (International)
Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited rights or remedies,
including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not
explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which are
expressly reserved.    
 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that ICC Development (International) Limited and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited are the owners of the exclusive rights
to the A/V content referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to
act on ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance related to infringement of such rights. 
 
 
On behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief
that use of such A/V content in the manner complained of is not
authorized by ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited, its agents, or the law. 
 
We thank you for your timely and full cooperation. 
  
  I, Sebastian Taylor, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 
 
 
Yours sincerely, 
            Sebastian Taylor 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
